ItemDesc: Upon use, increases all allies' ATK by <unbreak>10%</unbreak> plus an additional <unbreak>120</unbreak> ATK increase for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: When it comes to SoulGlad, the term "classic" represents the best. Despite attempts to modify the formula three times, the company was compelled to return to the original recipe due to complaints from dissatisfied customers.\n\n"Our double-blind tests show that over 70% of customers failed to discern the difference between the new formula and the original one."
